translations: 在字下划横线；用斜体字排字；强调

sentences.sentence: You can Bold or Italicize the selected font.
sentences.translation: 你可以大胆或标示选定字体。

sentences.sentence: Bold text, italicize words, or even upload your own photos and videos.
sentences.translation: 粗体，斜体字，甚至上传自己的照片和录像。

sentences.sentence: In this book, we italicize comments to make them stand out from the normal program text.
sentences.translation: 本书中，注释排成斜体以区别于一般程序文本。
